alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 7:41AM EST until January 09 at 10:08PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek at Club Drive near Lilburn affecting Gwinnett County. For the Yellow River Basin...including Suwanee, Lawrenceville, Plantation Rd Lawrenceville, Lilburn, Tanglewood Drive Snellville, Snellville, Snellville, Silver Hill Rd Stone Mtn, Lithonia, Stone Mountain, Lee Road below Snellville, Lithonia, Lithonia, Lithonia, Milstead, Gees Mill Road, Snellville, Loganville, Milstead, Milstead, Milstead, Rocky Plains...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast to occur. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek at Club Drive near Lilburn. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Minor flooding will continue to expand further into the Northwood Country Club Golf Course upstream from the gage on Club Drive...and in the woodland areas downstream from the gage...and for the next four miles until the creek merges with the Yellow River. An old concrete golf cart bridge around 300 feet downstream from the gage will be around two feet under water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 12.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 11 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued this evening at 745 PM EST.
